description: Currently when a quota such as number of instance limits is exceed the message returned is "Quota exceeded: code=InstanceLimitExceeded (HTTP 413)" This would be more beneficial if it gave the actual limit and amount used back. For Example, "Quota exceeded: You have used 1 of 1 instances"
title: Exceeded Quotas need to provide better error messages
